package main

import (
	"errors"
	"fmt"
	"io/fs"
)

func main() {
	var err error
	if errors.Is(err, fs.ErrNotExist) {
		fmt.Println("File does not exist")
	}
	if errors.Is(err, fs.ErrExist) {
		fmt.Println("File exists")
	}
	if errors.Is(err, fs.ErrPermission) {
		fmt.Println("Permission denied")
	}
}
